name: Elementalism
description:
You exert control over the elements, creating one of the following effects within range:
- Beckon Air: Create a breeze strong enough to ripple cloth, stir dust, rustle leaves, and close open doors/shutters (unless held open).
- Beckon Earth: Create a thin shroud of dust or sand that covers a 5-foot square area, or cause a single word to appear in handwriting in a patch of dirt or sand.
- Beckon Fire: Create a thin cloud of harmless embers and smoke, light a candle/torch/campfire, or snuff out a small flame.
- Beckon Water: Create a spray of cool mist or cause up to 1 cup of water to spill from a container.
- Sculpt Element: Cause dirt, sand, fire, smoke, mist, or water to assume a crude shape (fitting in a 1-foot cube) for 1 round.

effects.description: Creates minor elemental effects (Air, Earth, Fire, Water) or sculpts elements.
